mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_birthdate, user_nationality, user_joindate, admin_yn, user_status) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, now(), #{user_nationality}, now(), 'n', 'n')
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where user_id = #{login_user_id} and user_pw = #{login_user_pw}

select * from tbl_word order by study_date asc

select * from tbl_sentence_test where user_id=#{id} and num=#{num}
mapper.update: update tbl_syllable_test set speak_accuracy = #{speak_accuracy}, lip_accuracy=#{lip_accuracy}, weak=#{weak}, reg_date=now() where user_id=#{user_id} and num=#{num}
update tbl_word_test set speak_accuracy = #{speak_accuracy}, lip_accuracy=#{lip_accuracy}, weak=#{weak}, reg_date=now() where user_id=#{user_id} and num=#{num}
update tbl_sentence_test set speak_accuracy = #{speak_accuracy}, lip_accuracy=#{lip_accuracy}, weak=#{weak}, reg_date=now() where user_id=#{user_id} and num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_syllable where study_date = #{day}
select * from tbl_word where study_date = #{day}
select * from tbl_sentence where study_date = #{day}
SELECT s.study_date FROM tbl_syllable AS s JOIN tbl_syllable_test AS t ON t.num = s.num WHERE t.user_id = #{id} group by s.study_date having COUNT(*)>=5 order by s.study_date;
SELECT w.study_date FROM tbl_word AS w JOIN tbl_word_test AS t ON t.num = w.num WHERE t.user_id = #{id} group by w.study_date having COUNT(*)>=5 order by w.study_date;
SELECT s.study_date FROM tbl_sentence AS s JOIN tbl_sentence_test AS t ON t.num = s.num WHERE t.user_id = #{id} group by s.study_date having COUNT(*)>=5 order by s.study_date;

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN t.speak_accuracy <=50 THEN 1 END) AS sp_bad_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.speak_accuracy > 50 THEN 1 END) AS sp_good_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.lip_accuracy <=50 THEN 1 END) AS lip_bad_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.lip_accuracy > 50 THEN 1 END) AS lip_good_acc FROM tbl_syllable AS s JOIN tbl_syllable_test AS t on s.num = t.num WHERE t.user_id = #{id} AND s.study_date = #{step}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN t.speak_accuracy <=50 THEN 1 END) AS sp_bad_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.speak_accuracy > 50 THEN 1 END) AS sp_good_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.lip_accuracy <=50 THEN 1 END) AS lip_bad_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.lip_accuracy > 50 THEN 1 END) AS lip_good_acc FROM tbl_word AS s JOIN tbl_word_test AS t on s.num = t.num WHERE t.user_id = #{id} AND s.study_date = #{step}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN t.speak_accuracy <=50 THEN 1 END) AS sp_bad_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.speak_accuracy > 50 THEN 1 END) AS sp_good_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.lip_accuracy <=50 THEN 1 END) AS lip_bad_acc, COUNT(CASE WHEN t.lip_accuracy > 50 THEN 1 END) AS lip_good_acc FROM tbl_sentence AS s JOIN tbl_sentence_test AS t on s.num = t.num WHERE t.user_id = #{id} AND s.study_date = #{step}
